r.d: SQLite is a C library that implements an embeddable SQL database engine. Programs that link with the SQLite library can have SQL database access without running a separate RDBMS process. This extension allows you to access SQLite databases from within PHP. Windows binary for PHP 4.3 is available from: http://snaps.php.net/win32/PECL_4_3/php_sqlite.dll **Note that this extension is built into PHP 5 by default**
r.n:
Upgraded libsqlite to version 2.8.14
"Fixed" the bug where calling sqlite_query() with multiple SQL statements in a single string would not work if you looked at the return value. The fix for this case is to use the new sqlite_exec() function instead. (Stas)
